alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 12:01PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gilmer and eastern Fannin Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1201 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Cherry Log, or near Blue Ridge, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Blue Ridge, Morganton, Dial, Cartecay, Pisgah, Cherry Log, Stover Creek Shelter, Roy and Margret. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
